features: ✓3 Pack In One Set - Great value with 3 pack microfiber spray mop pads compatible with Swiffer PowerMop, measures 15.7*6.7 inch, Fit for most 13-15 inch Velcro mop frames. Super absorbent feature, perfect for both dry and wet scrubbing floor cleaning.

✓Top Grade Selected Material - To Achieve a better performance of cleaning effect, we applied top grade high quality microfiber material, unlike normal microfiber material, we make it enhanced the friction between pads and floor in order to reach more efficiency cleaning without harm the floor and maximum your efforts. Easily removing any hard cleaning stains , spills, oil, and footprints and it can be used in all wood floors, bare floors, hardwood, , tile, stone or any hard surface floors.

✓Residue And Lint Free - Knowing you are bothered by the residue and lint left after mopping, our microfiber mop pad replacement features high density braided design, makes the every small fiber stay firmly without shedding and cleaning thoroughly your place. It is designed to clean all kinds of stubborn stains, and dry more quickly than traditional sponge mop.

✓Efficient In Tackling Any Cleaning Job - The premium microfiber spray mop pads built in looped design superfine fiber capture dust, dirt and grime like a magnet, won’t push the debris around as other’s. Extra thickness feature add better water absorption to the pads, aim to get you all cleaning jobs done.

✓Eco- Friendly and money saving - It is reusable and washable, save your money from disposal pads. Our spray mop pads can be machine washed or just hand washed, machine Wash on Hot or Cold with no fabric softener and Please hang to dry for long life-span. No need to steam or tumble dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cleaning Pad
reviews.reviewText: Of course! Here's your review with some minor edits for clarity and flow:In my quest for a more efficient way to clean my house, I stumbled upon these cleaning pads while browsing on Amazon. Intrigued by their potential, I decided to give them a try. One of the things I appreciate about Amazon is their reliable return policy, which provides a safety net for trying out new products.My decision to try these cleaning pads was driven by the hope of finding a cleaning solution that could simplify my life. After all, who wouldn't want a more efficient way to tackle household chores?Amazon's convenience and the ability to explore a wide range of products while reading reviews from other users played a pivotal role in my decision-making process. It's a platform that encourages experimentation, and knowing that I could easily return the items if they didn't meet my expectations gave me the confidence to take the plunge.I took the leap and started using these cleaning pads, and I have to say, they've been a game-changer. They pull off marks from the flooring with ease and are excellent at absorbing excess water during the cleaning process.One of their standout features is their versatility. I can simply dip them in a bucket of cleaning solution and get to work on my floors without any hassle. Alternatively, if I prefer to spray the floor, these pads are equally up to the task. They're like a versatile cleaning tool that adapts to my needs.Another major advantage is their coverage. These pads efficiently cover a substantial area in a relatively short amount of time. This means that I can get my cleaning done quickly and efficiently, allowing me to spend more time on things I enjoy.Overall, I'm thrilled with the performance of these cleaning pads. They've simplified my cleaning routine and made it much more efficient. If you're looking for a hassle-free way to tackle your floor cleaning chores, I highly recommend giving these pads a try. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for buffing wax after disinfectant mopping
reviews.reviewText: Came as a set of 4 replacements for the original pads. I like to have e extra on hand so I can cycle them and also have extras for occasional spill cleanup.The ridge on the outside adds a nice passover when applying wood soap after disinfectant mopping, and just like the original pads, are easy to put on and pull off for cleaning. Toss them right in the washer alongside your rugs and they'll be ready for the next use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mop pads
reviews.reviewText: These mop pads work great on my marble floors. I usually use two each time I clean— one for getting dirt off and another to dry afterwards. They wash and dry well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023

reviews.reviewText: These are thick and wash well, I would order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but disappointing
reviews.reviewText: Stick well to the mop, and they do pickup a lot of dirt. But they are made cheeply- probably won't last very long. The edge on one of mine already unraveled after 1 use and washing. But they are cheep and 3 out the 4 seem to be okay. Just wish all 4 would have been made better and lasted longer.
